title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4040.2 - Owning race horses forbidden
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4040.2 - Owning race horses forbidden

State Regulations

No jockey, nor such jockey's spouse, parent, issue
nor member of such jockey's household, shall be the owner of any race
horse. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4040.2

Amended

New

York State Register July 20, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 29, eff. 7/20/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
